beer.name: Santa;s Private Reserve
beer.description: A double-hopped Red, reddish in color, with a roasty, malty flavor and a hoppy spruce finish.
beer.grains: Great Western Harrington, Klages, Munich & Hugh Baird Carastan 30-37 & 13-17, Crystal 70-80.
Great Western Harrington, Klages, Munich & Hugh Baird Carastan 30-37 & 13-17, Crystal 70-80.
beer.yeast: Rogue's Pacman Yeast and Free Range Coastal Water.
